TopicTitle: A new kraken species has been found!

Articles.Content:
I just found a new kraken species. I call it the plasma kraken. It rarely occurs when loading a quicksave in athmosphere. This is what is does:

Basically, your craft is floating in nothingness while drowning in reentry effects.

If you try to hide the control elements, they start reentering too.

Discuss this horrible new kraken!

Edited April 6, 2014 by Kinglet
I had that jappen in past versions while loading a landed plane in quickload. It doesn't break anything that was saved already.
There was something like that with KMP. One quote was "It seems your main menu is experiencing atmospheric entry. On the Mun". "Only with KMP folks!"
That's actually pretty impressive, looks like the old blue void bug though, I guess you had some engines running at the time?

That's actually pretty impressive, looks like the old blue void bug though, I guess you had some engines running at the time?

No, I did not have engines on. Did you ever hear the whooshing sound when loading a craft in atmosphere? Maybe this is where this kraken came from.
does this have any implications for the kraken drive ?
This is why they didn'T allow us to quicksave in the atmosphere before...
